text: <@UMBFA316K> did you get this sorted out? The path not found tells me that the path in your module is not accurate.

Does anyone have a solution for resolving these errors in VScode... All my CSS files are riddled with hubl syntax errors because it cant recognize the hubl. I have  all the suggested extensions installed.
<@ULAT79K6J> you could try a jinja extension and add the additional file extensions/associations to it
Thanks <@U7V9DQ31P> ill look into that. I wasn't aware I could configure jinja with additional extensions.
I use sublime but haven't ran into any issues so I assume it's one of my other plugins that's doing it lol not really sure to be honest
Well this points me in a direction, so thanks a ton!
oh, i think it's the `twig` plugin i have. It also has the same syntax as hubl for the most part. so you could try that as well.
